about_me.headline: Who I am
about_me.title: About me
about_me.intro: Hey there, I'm Lukas! Write some IT-related information about yourself. Why are you passionate about coding? What inspires you to improve your programming skills?
about_me.question1: Where are you based? Are you open to remote work or relocation?
about_me.question2: Show that you are open-minded. Are you enthusiastic about learning new technologies?
about_me.question3: Describe your problem-solving approach. Do you learn from challenges and search for efficient solutions? Keywords: analytical thinking, creativity, persistence, collaboration.

skills.intro: A short introduction of your skills. Highlight your experience with different front-end technologies and emphasise your openness to learning and adapting to new technologies. Show how important it is for you to keep up with rapid changes in web development.
skills.contactMe: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

contact.encourageText: Encourage people to contact you and describe what role you are interested in. Show that you will add value to their projects through your work.
contact.privacyText3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
contact.privacyError: You must agree to the privacy policy

testimonials.headline: what my colleagues say about me

first.text: Tobias is a reliable and committed member of the project team. He communicates clearly and contributes to efficient coordination. His structured approach and consistent use of project management principles ensure stable workflows. His clean, readable code and technical accuracy play a key role in the project’s success.
first.author: Demis Moysidis – Join

second.text: Tobias demonstrates strong competence and works in a structured and precise way. He solves complex problems through analytical thinking and remains calm when facing challenges. His experience and teamwork make him a key contributor and a respected colleague.
second.author: Amer Alkhalidy – Join

third.text: Tobias works with great commitment and takes on a large share of the project tasks. His reliability and responsibility ensure the project’s success. Without his consistent effort, the result would not have reached the same level. I fully recommend him.
third.author: Madina Askar Zada – Kochwelt

fourth.text: Tobias shows ambition and finds solutions for every challenge. He supports team members reliably and shares his knowledge openly. His help strengthens the team’s collaboration.
fourth.author: Julian Kohn – Join

projects.headline: Portfolio
projects.description: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

join.name: Join
join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

knighthood.name: Knighthood
knighthood.description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

dabubble.name: DA Bubble
dabubble.description: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

pokedex.name: Pokedex
pokedex.description: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

legal.title: Legal Notice
legal.name: Tobias Dreifke
legal.acceptance_terms_text: By accessing and using Portfolio (Product), you acknowledge and agree to the following terms and conditions, and any policies, guidelines, or amendments thereto that may be presented to you from time to time. We, the listed students, may update or change the terms and conditions from time to time without notice.
legal.scope_ownership_title: Scope and ownership of the product
legal.scope_ownership_text1: Portfolio has been developed as part of a student group project in a web development bootcamp at the Developer Akademie GmbH. It has an educational purpose and is not intended for extensive personal & business usage. As such, we cannot guarantee consistent availability, reliability, accuracy, or any other aspect of quality regarding this Product.
legal.scope_ownership_text2: The design of Portfolio is owned by the Developer Akademie GmbH. Unauthorized use, reproduction, modification, distribution, or replication of the design is strictly prohibited.
legal.proprietary_rights_text: Aside from the design owned by Developer Akademie GmbH, we, the listed students, retain all proprietary rights in Portfolio, including any associated copyrighted material, trademarks, and other proprietary information.
legal.use_product_text: Portfolio is intended to be used for lawful purposes only, in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations. Any use of Portfolio for illegal activities, or to harass, harm, threaten, or intimidate another person, is strictly prohibited. You are solely responsible for your interactions with other users of Portfolio.
legal.disclaimer_title: Disclaimer of warranties and limitation of liability
legal.disclaimer_text: Portfolio is provided "as is" without warranty of any kind, whether express or implied, including but not limited to the implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement. In no event will we, the listed students, or the Developer Akademie GmbH, be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential or exemplary damages, including but not limited to, damages for loss of profits, goodwill, use, data, or other intangible losses, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages, arising out of or in connection with the use or performance of Portfolio.
legal.indemnity_text: You agree to indemnify, defend and hold harmless us, the listed students, the Developer Akademie GmbH, and our affiliates, partners, officers, directors, agents, and employees, from and against any claim, demand, loss, damage, cost, or liability (including reasonable legal fees) arising out of or relating to your use of Portfolio and/or your breach of this Legal Notice.
legal.contact_text: For any questions or notices, please contact us at mail@tobiasdreifke.com.
